title: Urfwick
body: When preseason started had 149k BE. i just leveled up today and got 1000 so now im at 150k BE. but it still says *not enough BE * if i try to purchase urfwick. PLEASE HELP

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Scarlet Eclipse,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uuN4UwyY,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-10T05:17:36.072+0000)
>
> When preseason started had 149k BE. i just leveled up today and got 1000 so now im at 150k BE. but it still says *not enough BE * if i try to purchase urfwick. PLEASE HELP

Hello, this is a bug, you actually still have less than 150k but it is displayed as 150k because it is rounded up. You are likely still missing approximately 1k. I had this problem but then I disenchanted one of my champion shards and it worked.
Maybe your client is telling you not to waste it :p
i dont really care about the skin itself or ww tbh. just want it because its exclusive lol

Yea, I get moments of weakness like that, too :P

But in all seriousness, if you're still having that issue, go submit your problem on the help page.  It's possibly the only branch of Riot that bothers giving half a shit about comments.

wether i mouse over it or just click on it, both still say *not enough BE*

i have reloged my client several times. still there. im going to cry....

Imagine if you could mouse over it and it would say the total amount? 

That would be common sense but riot seems to be in short supply of that recently.
